sprint_goal: Establish the foundational security framework (RBAC) and implement the core master data models for Users, Vehicles, Drivers, and Customers.
Implement the core trip lifecycle workflow, from trip creation and assignment to Proof of Delivery by the driver. Enable the foundational audit trail.
Deliver key high-value features: GST-compliant e-invoicing with GSP integration and the real-time vehicle tracking map for dispatchers.
